name: Korvax Rend
title: The Broken Titan
description: A former shock trooper engineered for frontline devastation. His Overheat systems malfunction on Vharos, forcing him to battle both enemies and himself.
lore: Gruff, self-loathing, protective, distrustful. Korvax speaks in clipped sentences and avoids emotional conversations. Beneath the armor is a man who fears what he's capable of.
